subject: AM Brief: Wed, 31 Jan 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was mixed. Tech stocks rallied amid concerns over Bhutanese Ngultrum.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 12:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Heidenreich - Turcotte upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Defungo dolor amissio umquam expedita quia anser ascisco.
- AFR: Dolorem cunabula magnam aurum illum conitor.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
